pages.text: Pylons can be found in Vaults.$(br2)They grant a $(l)temporary statistic increase$() to the player. The $(l)effect$() it gives and the $(l)duration$() of it is displayed $(l)above$() the Pylon.$(br2)A Pylon can be $(l)consumed$() by $(l)right-clicking$() it.

pages.title: Effects
pages.text: The available $(l)effects$() it may apply to the player are:$(br)$(li)Regeneration$()$(li)Increased Health$()$(li)Regenerate all Mana$()$(li)Speed$()$(li)Strength$()$(li)Item Quantity$()$(li)Item Rarity$()
